photos.alt: Windy road in a horseshoe shape cutting through a rugged hilly landscape
Elevated view of the Columbia River Gorge with a narrow highway tracing the near shoreline
Truss bridge in the distance stretching across the gorge
River descending through a series of rocky ledges in a dense forest
Light falling on a thundering waterfall in the distance, as viewed from low foliage
Small waterfall amid mossy rocks and tree leaves
Small arch bridge extending across the middle of a towering multi-drop waterfall
